title: Sovereign AGI Resource Budget Policy (C-07)
description: Defines resource limits (time, memory, IO count) based on estimated action costs (M-02 cost_metric), used by the Planner (M-03) and Execution Engine to manage and constrain execution time/resources.

default_timeout_ms.description: The standard maximum runtime allowed for an action with an unclassified or simple cost profile.

complexity_limits.description: Specific resource ceilings applied based on the M-02 cost_metric classification.

HEAVY_COMPUTATION.description: Budget for highly resource-intensive actions (e.g., deep learning inference).

emergency_shutdown_thresholds.description: Global resource thresholds that trigger system intervention.
